players.name: Alice
memory:
Diana: "Observing the game, I haven't seen any suspicious behavior yet.
I am keeping an eye on everyone."

Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he investigated Alice, revealing her as the mafioso.
I am sharing this information to help the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
